hero.title: Technology Stack
hero.description: We use open-source tools and resources that are supported and continuously improved by the community, and thus are the most reliable and flexible. We keep a close eye on web development novelties, but do not forget about the best standards.
hero.javascript: We use all modern features of JavaScript, but we also apply tools that allow our projects to work in old versions of browsers, including old versions of IE.
hero.typescript: We also use TypeScript and Flow to add static typing support in JS. This helps us to write flexible and reliable code.
